mapper.select: select * from ( select a.aci_id as qua_id, a.aci_name as qua_name, a.aci_nickname as qua_nickname, b.* from account_info a left outer join question_info b on a.aci_seq = b.qsi_aci_seq ) e left outer join ( select c.aci_id as ans_id, c.aci_name as ans_name, c.aci_nickname as ans_nickname, d.* from account_info c left outer join answer_info d on c.aci_seq = d.asi_aci_seq ) f on e.qsi_seq = f.asi_qsi_seq where qsi_comment like '%${keyword}%' limit 15 offset #{offset}
select ceil(count(*)/15) from question_info where qsi_comment like '%${keyword}%'
SELECT a.*, b.aci_id, b.aci_name FROM question_info a left outer join account_info b on a.qsi_aci_seq = b.aci_seq where qsi_seq = #{seq}
SELECT a.*, b.aci_id, b.aci_name FROM answer_info a left outer join account_info b on a.qsi_aci_seq = b.aci_seq where asi_seq = #{asi_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question_info (qsi_aci_seq, qsi_title, qsi_comment) VALUES (#{qsi_aci_seq}, #{qsi_title}, #{qsi_comment})
